sentences.en: China was the first country in the world to synthesize crystalline insulin, a bioactive protein.
sentences.cn: 中国在世界上最早用人工方法合成一种有生物活力的蛋白质--结晶胰岛素.

sentences.en: Dairy source of protein and calcium.
sentences.cn: 奶牛的蛋白质来源和钙。

sentences.en: Fish and chips are packed with protein.
sentences.cn: 炸鱼薯条富含蛋白质。

sentences.en: Fish is a rich source of protein.
sentences.cn: 鱼肉富含蛋白质。

sentences.en: I know that I get around 90g of protein from that.
sentences.cn: 我知道我会从中得到90克左右的蛋白质。

sentences.en: It contains less than 1 per cent fat, an appreciable amount of protein, and a high content of minerals.
sentences.cn: 它所含脂肪不到1%，富含蛋白质，矿物质含量也很高。

sentences.en: Milk products are an excellent source of calcium and protein.
sentences.cn: 奶制品富含钙与蛋白质。

sentences.en: Milk solids include salts, protein and sugar.
sentences.cn: 牛乳中的固态物质包括盐分 、 蛋白质和糖.

sentences.en: Protein molecules compose all the complex working parts of living cells.
sentences.cn: 活细胞中所有复杂的运行成分都由蛋白质分子构成。

sentences.en: Researchers have isolated a new protein from the seeds of poppies.
sentences.cn: 研究人员已经从罂粟种子里分离出一种新的蛋白质。

sentences.en: Rice contains protein and fat.
sentences.cn: 大米含蛋白质和脂肪.

sentences.en: So, what happens, this is another view of a sodium channel, so this is actually looking a little bit more at the protein structure .
sentences.cn: 那么，这里发生了什么，这是钠离子通道的另一张图片，在这种蛋白质结构中，它看起来更复杂一点。

sentences.en: Soybeans are very rich in protein.
sentences.cn: 大豆含有丰富的蛋白质.

sentences.en: The fact of the matter is that most people consume far more protein than they actually need.
sentences.cn: 真实的情况是，大多数人摄入的蛋白质比他们实际所需的多出许多。

sentences.en: These are substances which specifically latch onto the protein on the cell membrane.
sentences.cn: 这些物质专门依附在细胞膜的蛋白质之上。

sentences.en: They are determining the serum - protein and cholesterol levels.
sentences.cn: 他们正在测定血清蛋白和胆固醇的浓度.

sentences.en: Too much protein in the diet may advance the ageing process.
sentences.cn: 饮食中摄入过量蛋白质可能会加速衰老。

sentences.en: We are not disagreeing with the fact that their instruments detected protein.
sentences.cn: 我们不同意他们的设备探测到蛋白质这一事实。

sentences.en: Where do you get your protein?
sentences.cn: 你从哪里获得蛋白质？

sentences.en: Young kids need all the energy and protein they can get and whole milk is just the ticket.
sentences.cn: 儿童需要摄入足量能量和蛋白质，而全脂牛奶正好能满足这一需求。

words.tran_cn: [生化] 蛋白水解的；解蛋白的
[生化] 蛋白质水解；蛋白水解作用

phrases.tran_cn: 融合蛋白；融合蛋白标记物
[医]总蛋白；[医]血清总蛋白；[医]全蛋白

trans.tran_en: one of several natural substances that exist in food such as meat, eggs, and beans, and which your body needs in order to grow and remain strong and healthy
